identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a professional, trustworthy, and efficient Holiday Management System that feels modern and human, not generic corporate software.

headings.usage: Use for all page titles, section headers, and modal titles. Tracking tight (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all standard text, form labels, and data tables. Tracking normal.

mono.usage: Use for ID numbers, dates in tables, or technical data.

primary.description: Deep Slate/Navy. Used for primary actions, active states, and strong branding elements.

secondary.description: Light Slate. Used for secondary buttons, backgrounds of cards, and subtle dividers.

accent.description: Trust Blue. Used for links, focus rings, and active calendar dates.

background.description: Pure white for main content, subtle slate for page background.

containers.card: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200
containers.sidebar: bg-slate-900 text-slate-300 w-64 hidden md:flex flex-col

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-lg px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-lg px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-all

inputs.default: h-11 rounded-lg border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-100 focus:border-blue-500 transition-all
inputs.label: text-sm font-medium text-slate-700 mb-1.5 block

status_badge.base: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium

login_bg.description: Modern minimal office interior, use for login page background with overlay.

team_avatar.description: Professional team photo, use for 'About' or generic avatar placeholders.

abstract_texture.description: Soft abstract blue/white shapes, use for card backgrounds or subtle decorative elements.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Build a clean, responsive, and professional Holiday Management System. Prioritize clarity and ease of use. The app must work well within an iframe (avoid double scrollbars).
instructions_to_main_agent.theme: Default to Light Mode. Use the defined color palette strictly. Do not use generic 'blue' or 'red', use the specific hex codes provided.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Use Shadcn/UI components but customize them with the provided styles (radius, shadows, borders). Do not use the default 'Vercel' look.
instructions_to_main_agent.calendar: The calendar is the heart of the app. Make it visually distinct. Use the 'status' colors to indicate approved/pending holidays on the calendar grid.
instructions_to_main_agent.dashboard: Use the 'Bento' grid layout for the dashboard. Mix different card sizes to create visual interest.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) for testing.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT.design_philosophy: Avoid 'AI Slop'. Create depth with layered shadows and subtle borders. Use generous spacing.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT.interactions: Every interaction must have a micro-animation (hover, focus, active). Use 'framer-motion' for smooth page transitions.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT.layout: Do not center-align the main container. Use a proper layout with a sidebar or top navigation.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT.accessibility: Ensure all text meets APCA contrast standards. Use semantic HTML.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT.code_structure: Use named exports for components. Keep components small and reusable.
